ask.gecmis: Honey, in your past, you experienced a 'mental awakening' in your love life and saw all the truths of a relationship as clearly as a sword stroke. Perhaps you were in a very complex situation and with an enlightenment that came at that moment, you put everything into place. That brave and sharp decision you took in that period allowed you to become much more free emotionally and to act with your own truths. This 'confronting the truth' state from those days is the biggest reason why you still seek such an honest and clear bond in love today. You discovered back then that love is not just about feeling, but also about understanding.
ask.simdi: Darling, you are currently in a complete 'decision-making' and 'logic' period in your love life; literally the smoke screen is clearing and you see everything in its full nakedness! If you have a relationship, the time has come to solve the problems between you by talking and producing logical solutions. If you are single, you trust the truths of your mind more than the voice of your heart and prepare your mind for an honest partner who truly deserves you. This card whispers to focus not on your emotions but on the naked truth in love right now and to swing that sword and break the bonds pulling you down if necessary. You are on the verge of a mental victory!
ask.gelecek: The magnificent clarity waiting for you in your future regarding love seems to radically change your life and eliminate all question marks. You will catch such an intellectual harmony and honesty with that person that no secrets will remain between you. Perhaps you will take a very radical decision, end a relationship, and sail toward a much healthier and visionary beginning. In the future, while living the most honest and intelligent form of love, you will be surprised how your soul is lightened by this clarity. Get ready darling, the most 'enlightened' love period of your life is starting very soon.

is.gecmis: In your past, you shone like a 'genius' in business life, changing your entire career path with a very sharp decision or an idea. Perhaps you started a project that no one dared to, or you drew your sword in a moment of crisis and showed the most logical way. This visionary and fearless stance in those days earned your professional identity immense authority and respect. That period where you used your logic and analysis skills at the highest level still causes you to be pointed out in the business world today. You proved back then that success is not just working hard, but giving the right decision at the right time.
is.simdi: Honey, you are currently under a complete 'breakthrough' and 'success' energy in business life; literally your mind is as sharp as a sword and you overcome every obstacle in one go! It is the perfect time to start a new project, sign an agreement, or make a radical change in your career. Everyone admires your intelligence and ability to produce solutions; you are shining literally like a leader. This card says not to act emotionally right now, but to trust your data and logic completely and make that sharp move. Success is waiting at the door, just swing that sword with confidence and declare your victory, darling.
is.gelecek: In your future, there is news of a magnificent victory regarding your career goals and a very important signature/decision. You will reach such a level that you will not only manage the works but also give direction to the entire industry with your strategy. Perhaps you will establish your own company or sit in that highest position of your dreams using only your intelligence. In the future, you will do everything called 'impossible' in business life and have your name written in golden letters. Success will be the brightest fruit of your sharp mind and honest stance, believe in this.

para.gecmis: In your past, you successfully overcame a financial crisis or opened a big income gate by making a very logical and sharp decision financially. Perhaps you got out of a debt trap with that determined stance or made a very smart investment, multiplying the value of your money. It was a very productive and honest period where you saw money not as a power but as a tool to build your freedom. This 'logical and clear' financial stance from those days allows you to look at money more safely and strategically even today. You discovered back then that abundance comes not just with luck, but with the right decision, darling.
para.simdi: Honey, a complete 'management' and 'strategy' period prevails in your wallet right now; you literally leave nothing to chance in financial matters! Perhaps you will sign an important contract or take a very radical investment decision for your financial future. This period is the time to receive the reward of cutting off emotional spending completely and focusing only on logical and long-term plans. The abundance of money increases rapidly along with your clear and determined stance, don't forget this. You currently feel like a complete 'strategy master' financially and are crafting your future step by step.
para.gelecek: In your future, a very important decision or a formal document appears that will relieve you financially and register your financial freedom. Perhaps a court result or the signature of a big business partnership will take your life to the peak financially. Days are very near when you will win a victory financially and multiply your money in the smartest ways. In the future, while gaining your financial independence, you will achieve this without being dependent on anyone and just with your own intelligence. A very bright, powerful, and victory-filled future awaits you for your wallet, darling.

saglik.gecmis: In your past, you experienced a 'turning point' regarding your health and personally experienced how you can heal your body with logical decisions. Perhaps you successfully went through an important surgery or implemented that radical decision that would radically change your lifestyle with a sword's sharpness. Those days when you felt very fit and mentally clear showed you how resilient your body is. This 'disciplined and clear' healing power you gained back then has been the greatest architect of your solid and glowing state today. You understood back then that the way to take good care of your body is through clearing your mind first.
saglik.simdi: Canım, your health energy is currently at that level of 'mental and physical power' you desire; you are as fit as a warrior! You are in a magnificent period where you cut away all excesses, bad habits, or stress sources with a sword stroke. If you have an ailment, this card gives you the good news that the most correct diagnosis will be made and a very successful treatment process will begin. Taking rational decisions, sticking to a diet program, or getting support from an expert will be the greatest medicine for you right now. Your light is noticeable even from the outside; you are literally shining with health and that victory energy.
saglik.gelecek: The health picture waiting for you in the future promises perfect vitality and mental clarity. You are entering a very powerful period where you achieve complete mastery over your body and hold your sword upright against all diseases. Perhaps you will experience a medical miracle or completely establish that disciplined lifestyle that will take your body to the highest level. The sharp decisions you will take to protect your health in the future will give you an energy everyone will envy even in your old age. Days when physical weakness is replaced by an unquenchable fire of life will be with you very soon.

hepsi.gecmis: When I look at your past, I see a general energy of 'victory' and 'the superiority of logic'; life has dragged you toward challenging but enlightening decisions many times. You lived that clear stance in love, that magnificent success in work, and that unshakable discipline in health at the same time, literally forging your fate like a sword. Those days when you approached life like a leader—honest and visionary—have been the biggest supporters of your vision today. You literally rebuilt your fate in the past with your sharp intelligence and fearless decisions, darling. Those victories continue to light your way even today.
hepsi.simdi: Honey, an atmosphere of 'breakthrough and clarity' prevails in every area of your life right now; literally everything is being shaped by those sharp decisions of yours! Your heart is surrounded with honesty, your mind with brilliant projects, and your body with strength so much that there is no obstacle that can stand before you. It is the perfect time to bring out the brave warrior within you to evaluate these new and powerful opportunities life offers you. Everything started with an idea, and now that idea is about to turn into a giant sword of victory that illuminates your whole world. Just believe and accept that lion's share life offers you without fearing anyone, darling.
hepsi.gelecek: Your future looks full of miraculous victories, clear decisions, and great successes in every area of life! You will shine like a strategy genius in love, work, and personal development, having a say in your entire industry/circle. Those sharp and profitable opportunities will make you so happy that you will throw all the confusion of the past aside and run toward the future with cries of victory. In this new journey full of success, happiness, and health, the universe will be your biggest supporter and your mind your greatest guide. Get ready darling, the clearest, most productive, and most powerful period of your life is starting very soon!

ask.gecmis: Darling, in your past, those very harsh and impulsive decisions you took in your love life unfortunately led to your heart being broken and a relationship ending unfairly. Perhaps you swung that sword without fully understanding or listening, and actually cut off your greatest happiness. This 'misunderstanding' and 'communication breakdown' back then somewhat damaged your pure faith in love and left you alone with regrets. Those days when you became a victim of your own anger or pride trigger the fear of 'am I making a mistake again?' even today when opening your heart to someone new. You lost love while trying to defend your own truths in love for a while, darling.
ask.simdi: Honey, you might be experiencing a period of 'mental confusion' and 'wrong decisions' in your love life right now; it's as if you can't see anything clearly. You might be acting very harsh, critical, and hurtful toward your partner, which weakens that beautiful bond between you every passing day. Perhaps you don't want to accept a truth and your mind is constantly playing games with you. This card says you need to stop for a moment, put that sword back in its scabbard, and find the balance between your emotions and logic. You are in a mental turmoil; don't make any radical decisions before you calm down, honey.
ask.gelecek: In your future, in some situations you will experience regarding love, there is a risk of pushing your partner away due to excessive rationalism or cruel honesty. That person who looks 'intelligent' might actually be someone who manipulates you mentally and drains your energy. Moving away from empathy by saying 'I know the best' might drag you into the same ice-cold loneliness in the future. However, this process will be a lesson given for you to learn to see with your heart, not just your mind, in love. If you want to establish a real bond in the future, you must learn to use that sword as a light, not as a weapon.

is.gecmis: In your past, you experienced a standstill in your career due to a faulty decision you made or a major conflict with an authority figure, darling. Perhaps you had a very brilliant idea but it was rejected because you presented it with the wrong style, or you were treated unfairly. While expecting a rise in your career, you might have slipped due to your own stubbornness or strategic mistakes. This 'mental blockage' and 'authority problems' back then still cast a shadow on your professional self-confidence today and make you afraid of taking risks. You drew your sword against the wrong person and at the wrong time in the business world, darling.
is.simdi: Honey, you might feel yourself in a 'chaos' and 'fear of failure' in business life right now; you literally can't bring any project to a conclusion. Your mind is so scattered that you think a thousand times even when making the simplest decisions and still choose the wrong way. Perhaps you were treated unfairly at work and this made you very angry and unproductive. This card whispers that you should completely change your strategy right now and be very careful in written agreements and signatures. You are in a victim psychology and feel as if your sword is blunt; you need to refresh your mind immediately.
is.gelecek: In your future, some legal problems, blocked projects, and big disappointments appear regarding your career plans, darling. If you are expecting an important signature, the fact that this signature is not signed or the conditions turn completely against you might annoy you quite a bit. You have a risk of losing a great opportunity to your rivals because of your arrogance or wrong analyses in business life. If you want to achieve success, don't give up on your dreams but be more modest and strategic about how to protect them. If you want to be successful in the future, you must give up that 'I know everything' attitude, darling.

para.gecmis: In your past, you experienced a major financial loss or were dragged into a debt trap due to a very risky and uncalculated decision you took financially. In that period when you used your ambition, not your logic, while managing money, your wallet must have weakened considerably and your peace fled. Perhaps the lack of abundance of an investment tired you quite a bit back then, and the places where you said 'I will earn money from this business' let you down. This financial disappointment causes you to approach money always with the fear of 'it will never be enough' and 'will I lose again?' today. You took risks for your ego, not for your financial freedom, back then, darling.
para.simdi: Honey, a period of 'unplannedness' and 'inability to decide' prevails in your wallet right now; money appears to be coming but you can't track where it goes. You might be inclined to believe groundless news or wrong investment advice in financial matters; please be very careful! This period says the conditions are not suitable at all for making a financial agreement and the risk of a legal glitch is high. You are in a time frame where you need to act with concrete data, not your emotions or ambition. You should master your expenses and protect your wallet from external influences.
para.gelecek: In your future, some losses you will experience in financial sense might grow further due to a wrong signature or a court/bank process. Panicking in a financial crisis and swinging the sword at the wrong place—that is, making a wrong investment—could lead you to a major bankruptcy. If you avoid the disciplined struggle you must give to protect your money, you might lose all your financial power in the future. In this process, it is essential to learn to be patient and use your logic rather than your ambition while managing money. To prosper in the future, you must get rid of the complex and unplanned spending in your wallet now.

saglik.gecmis: In your past, you neglected a health warning by saying 'I'm too smart, it'll pass' or by believing a wrong diagnosis, and you made the healing process difficult, darling. While your body was giving alarms, you were so busy with those unending ambitions or conflicts in your mind that you couldn't show the necessary care to your health. Perhaps you underwent a very risky medical intervention or the healing process was prolonged due to a mistake. This 'mental resistance' state triggers the fear of 'is there something serious?' even at the slightest fatigue today. Back then, you listened to the voice of your ego, not the voice of your body, honey.
saglik.simdi: Honey, your body is currently in 'mental fatigue' and 'nervous tension'; your unending indecision is exhausting every cell! You are forcing yourself so much that your brain has reached the point of giving an error. This card cries out that you urgently need to take a break, do a digital detox, or at least be silent for a bit. You cannot save the whole world; you must first sharpen that blunt sword in your own mind and calm down. Please put aside those sharp and hurtful thoughts; otherwise a serious health problem is inevitable very soon, darling.
saglik.gelecek: In your future, a process that will challenge you regarding health and where you will deal especially with head/nervous system-related issues awaits you. As long as you see taking care of yourself as a 'waste of time,' reaching full vitality will be that much more difficult and painful. The physical fatigues you will encounter in the future will be a result of your current suppressed anger and wrong decisions. You might have to enter a very radical and restrictive treatment program to regain your health in the future. If you don't learn to silence that ambitious warrior within you now, your body will one day force you to stop.

hepsi.gecmis: When I look at your past, I see a general energy of 'wrong moves' and 'mental fatigue'; life has tested you many times with your arrogance and impulsiveness. Acting harshly in love, breaking people in work, and saying 'nothing happens to me' in health might have led you to some deep regrets today. Those days when you lost your inner peace and truths while trying to manage the lives of others have left a deep wound in your soul. You swung your sword against life not as a light but as a weapon, and this has isolated you, darling. This 'wrong use of power' back then still makes you restless today.
hepsi.simdi: Honey, you are currently in a phase of 'chaos' and 'indecision' in your general life; it's as if you can't see anything clearly and you are constantly making mistakes. Whichever job you touch, it stays in your hand; the news you expect always comes incomplete or wrong; your energy is crawling on the floor. This card whispers that this 'scattered and indecisive' state has extinguished that bright intelligence within you. Why did you fall apart so easily and why did you make everything so complex? You must pull yourself together immediately and hold the ropes of your life not with your emotions, but only with your logic. You might be a champion but your sword is very rusty right now; time to clean it.
hepsi.gelecek: In your future, some major obstacles, legal problems, and wrong decisions in the general rhythm of life might be waiting for you, darling. Much more discipline and honesty than you expect will be needed for those big changes you planned to happen. Instead of thinking 'I can do everything' in love and work, you should make a more modest defense plan against the difficulties you will encounter. The sword of victory life will offer you will not light immediately, or it might burn you when it lights, so you must be very careful. If you learn to be patient and look at events from a wider window, that true big victory will be yours.

is.gecmis: Honey, in your past, you were in such a dilemma in business life that your mind was weary from going back and forth between two options. A decision was needed, but perhaps because of your fears, you chose to close your eyes and ignore the events. This 'standstill' and 'indecision' caused you to stall in your career for a while. But that silent waiting actually taught you how important it is to listen to your inner voice. You discovered back then that sometimes stopping is also an action in the business world.
is.simdi: Honey, you are currently in a complete 'dead end' or 'waiting' period in business life; literally standing in the middle of two paths, you've crossed your swords on your chest! There is a very important matter you need to decide on, but right now you don't want to accept any data and choose to leave events as they are. This card says you are trying to stay in balance instead of choosing a side, but this uncertainty is eating you up inside. The time has come to remove the blindfold and face the truths, but you still take refuge in that comfortable silence. A little courage darling, the truths might hurt but they will set you free.
is.gelecek: In your future, a choice that will challenge you a lot regarding your career plans and almost a 'balance test' appears, darling. You will reach such a point that both options will look equally attractive or risky to you; so you might wait without deciding for a while longer. Even though this process will tire you mentally, you will eventually find such a middle way that you will surprise everyone. If you want to be successful in business life in the future, you must focus on events with all your courage instead of closing your eyes when that moment comes. Be patient, that right decision will eventually clear up with your intuition.

para.gecmis: In your past, you were caught between two investments or expenses financially and had frozen yourself like a statue to establish a financial balance. Those days when you didn't know where to direct money might have restricted you economically and caused you to experience the lack of abundance of indecision. This 'financial blockage' feeling causes you to approach money always with the fear of 'am I making a mistake?' today. You stayed silent in those days not for financial freedom, but to not take risks, darling. That silence taught you how to protect money but not how to multiply it.
para.simdi: Honey, a 'stagnation' and 'indecision' prevails in your wallet right now; you are literally keeping the money as it is because you don't know what to do with it. There is an investment opportunity, but you are so afraid of risks that you choose to close your eyes and act as if nothing is happening. This card says you are trying to establish financial balance right now, but this passive state actually deprives you of gain. In this period where you stopped the flow of money, you should leave those two swords in your mind on the ground and focus on concrete data. You are literally in a waiting room for your wallet right now!
para.gelecek: In your future, a financial choice and uncertainty period that will make you sweat a bit awaits you, darling. A property sale or a major investment issue will come to the agenda, but you will wear yourself out for a long time wondering whether to say 'yes' or 'no.' In this process, if you don't get expert support, your cash might lose value due to your indecision. To reach financial independence in the future, it will be essential to remove the blindfold and face the actual figures when that moment comes. The gate of abundance is there, but you are currently closing it with your swords; in the future, you will need to lower those swords.

saglik.gecmis: In your past, you ignored a symptom or a treatment method regarding your health, literally closing your eyes to events and saying 'it'll pass on its own,' darling. While your body was giving signals, you were so busy with the confusion in your mind that you couldn't choose the healing path. This 'indecision' and 'passivity' perhaps caused a small problem to take longer to heal. You understood the value of health much better in those silent and dark days of waiting. This lack of resistance back then causes you to look at your health more cautiously but equally anxiously today.
saglik.simdi: Honey, you are currently in complete 'indecision' and 'negligence' regarding your health; literally going back and forth between going to a doctor or not. Your body is whispering to you, but you have donned your swords in your mind so much that you don't want to hear any warnings. This card whispers that you are experiencing an 'emotional blockage' and this situation is turning into physical fatigue. Please remove the blindfold and take those small glitches in your body seriously and get an expert opinion. The gate of healing is open to you, but you are currently standing like a statue in front of it; you must take action.
saglik.gelecek: In your future, a 'moment of decision' appears that will tire you a bit regarding health but eventually allow you to find balance, darling. Perhaps you will stay between İki different treatment methods or İki different diets, weighing for a long time which one will be better for you. In this process, your indecision might leave you physically exhausted, so you must learn to trust your intuition. That clear step you will take to protect your health in the future will bring you vitality and inner peace that will last for years. When you lower those swords from your chest, you will see how your body is lightened, honey.

hepsi.gecmis: When I look at your past, I see a general energy of 'indecision' and 'inaction'; life has brought you to a fork in the road many times, but you chose to stop. Those days when you closed your eyes in love, work, and personal struggles and waited for events to resolve themselves might be following you today. Choosing to freeze things instead of repairing them has left some 'unfinished' things in your life. You were like a warrior who took their guard but never swung their sword back then. You lost a lot of time in that silent waiting room, darling.
hepsi.simdi: Honey, you are currently in a complete 'stalemate' period in your general life; you literally can't take a step in any matter! Everyone expects a decision from you, but you close your eyes as if you are in a dream, not even wanting to watch what's happening. This card whispers that this current 'indecision' and 'passive' state is imprisoning the great potential within you. Why are you so afraid and why did you cross those swords on your chest? You must immediately solve that blindfold, face the truths, and take the ropes of your life back in your hands. You are not a victim, just a soul afraid of making a decision.
hepsi.gelecek: In your future, you will experience that familiar 'staying between two options' situation again in the face of the tests that await you in your general life, honey. In your career, love, and financial situation, your mind will get so confused in the face of simultaneous opportunities that you might withdraw your hands from the world for a while longer. However, if you don't remove the blindfold early this time, life will make the decisions for you and you might not like it much. If you want to find peace in the future, you should learn to take risks and keep going even if it's the wrong decision. Life is a flowing river; you cannot stand like a rock in the middle of that river, darling.

ask.gecmis: Honey, in your past, you stayed indecisive for so long in your love life and ignored events that eventually that accumulated explosion leveled everything. Perhaps you didn't want to see a truth, but when that truth hit you in the face one day, nothing was the same. This 'forced awakening' and 'emotional chaos' back then somewhat damaged your pure faith in love and must have worn you out. Those days when you became a victim of your own indecision or your partner's lies make it difficult to trust someone new today. While walking with your eyes closed in love, you fell from a cliff for a while, darling.
ask.simdi: Honey, you are currently experiencing a period of 'masks falling' and 'confronting bitter truths' in your love life; literally that blindfold broke all of a sudden! Secrets about your partner might be coming out, or you've realized you can't run from your own emotions anymore. This situation might make you feel very tense and angry, but believe me, this chaos is the only way for you to become free. Staying between two options is over; now is the time to swing those swords and clear your life. You are in an emotional earthquake right now, but you will come out of the wreckage much stronger, believe in this.
ask.gelecek: In your future, in some situations you will experience regarding love, there is a risk of creating a big chaos with your own hands due to extreme indecision. Those 'unsolvable' looking problems will actually be an accumulation of the decisions you didn't give on time. Panicking by saying 'I am experiencing the same things again' in your relationships might drag you into a bigger loneliness in the future. However, this process will be a final lesson given for you to walk with your 'eyes open' in love and not tolerate lies anymore. If you want to establish a real bond in the future, you should use those swords to draw your boundaries, not on your chest.

is.gecmis: In your past, you were in such a deadlock in business life that eventually you took a step in the wrong direction and experienced a great confusion in your career, honey. Because you panicked in that critical moment when you had to decide, you made a strategic mistake and this mistake challenged you materially and spiritually for a while. This 'wrong awakening' and 'chaotic decisions' back then still cast a shadow on your professional self-confidence today and make you nervous in every new job. While trying to walk with a blindfold in the business world, you crashed into a hard wall and scattered everything, darling. The pain of those days still acts as if it's inside you.
is.simdi: Honey, you are currently in complete 'information pollution' and 'loss of direction' in business life; you are confused about who to believe and which path to choose. Lies at work, hidden agendas, and things going on behind your back are coming out one by one, and this is making you very aggressive. This card whispers that this current 'explosion' state could drag you into bigger mistakes, so you should avoid impulsive decisions. Your indecision is over, but the big anger and confusion that replaced it are also wearing you out. Right now your swords seem out of control; you must stop and take a deep breath first, darling.
is.gelecek: In your future, some major scandals regarding your career plans or the emergence of unexpected lies might shake you quite a bit, honey. While making an important business deal, you will learn at the last moment that the other party is not honest at all and you will escape from a big chaos by a hair's breadth. The confusion you will encounter at the moment you say 'I am definitely on the right track this time' in your career will test your patience and intelligence to the end. In this process, you shouldn't give up but you must learn not to trust anyone blindly anymore. If you want to reach success, you should think twice before swinging your sword in the future.

para.gecmis: In your past, that decision you couldn't give financially finally exploded on its own and left you alone with a big debt or loss, darling. Those payments you said 'let me not think about it now' accumulated, and when they knocked on your door one day, you didn't know what to do. Your passivity while trying to establish a balance financially might have caused you to lose your financial freedom completely in that period. This 'financial awakening,' but a painful one, causes you to approach money always with a fear of 'it will never be enough' today. You were waiting with your financial swords crossed on your chest while your wallet was pierced in those days, honey.
para.simdi: Honey, a complete period of 'lies and wrong investments' prevails in your wallet right now; someone has their eye on your money or you are being misdirected! Your refusal to see the truths in financial matters has brought you to the brink of a bigger bankruptcy, and that blindfold is now tearing. This card says you urgently need to check all your accounts and question whether honesty is being maintained especially in your partnerships. Instead of protecting your money, you've literally thrown it into a chaos. There is a storm warning for your wallet right now; you must immediately take your guard and cut unnecessary expenses with a sword.
para.gelecek: In your future, some losses you will experience financially will appear as a result of your past indecision and trust in the wrong people. In a financial crisis, you might be confused about who to trust and completely consume your cash with a wrong move. Because you were late in that honest struggle you must give to protect your money, you might have to deal with some legal sanctions in the future. In this process, it is a must to learn to be patient and keep your eyes wide open in financial matters. If you want to prosper in the future, you must clear those dark spots in your wallet now.

saglik.gecmis: In your past, you ignored a health symptom for so long that eventually that small problem grew like an explosion and put you in bed, darling. While your body was giving alarms, you thought you were protecting yourself with the swords in your mind, but actually you were just blocking your healing. Perhaps you had to go through a surgery or a mandatory treatment process because you had nowhere else to run. This 'mandatory health awakening' triggers the fear of 'will it get worse again?' even at the slightest fatigue today. Back then, you listened to the silence of your fears, not the voice of your body, honey.
saglik.simdi: Honey, your body is currently in 'overload' and 'nervous discharge'; your unending indecision has turned into physical pain! Your eyes are open, but the tired picture you see panics you more, and this situation might be hitting your heart or blood pressure. This card cries out that you urgently need to see an expert and leave the confusion within you aside and focus on your physical treatment. Everything you neglected is piling up right now and you don't know which one to cope with. Please leave those swords on the ground and just show compassion to your body; otherwise a collapse is inevitable very soon.
saglik.gelecek: In your future, a process where you will deal with the big fatigue brought by the collapse of your immune system awaits you, darling. Those days when you saw taking care of yourself as an 'unnecessary detail' will come across as chronic pains in the future. If you start a treatment, there is a risk of the process becoming a chaos due to your lack of discipline and indecision. You might have to make a very radical and perhaps painful lifestyle change to regain your health in the future. If you don't give up that 'eyes closed' state now, your body will wake you up one day in the harshest way.

hepsi.gecmis: When I look at your past, I see a general energy of 'forced awakening' and 'chaotic decisions'; life has cornered you many times and opened that blindfold by force. Those days spent among disappointment in love, lies in work, and negligence in health made you more aggressive and equally timid today. Because you stopped at the moments you had to decide, life gave the harshest decisions for you and this must have worn you out quite a bit. You were like a warrior who took their guard but stabbed the swords into their own soul for a period. This 'loss of direction' back then still follows you, honey.
hepsi.simdi: Honey, you are currently in a phase of 'information explosion' and 'chaos' in your general life; whatever was hidden is coming out and you don't know what to do! Whichever job you touch, you encounter a lie; the news you expect always comes in a way that will shake you; your energy is like a fire pit. This card whispers that this 'scattered and angry' state has completely destroyed your common sense. Why were you so late and why did you persist so much in not seeing the truths? You must pull yourself together immediately, take your swords under control, and hold the ropes of your life with wisdom, not anger. You are not a victim, just a hero experiencing a harsh awakening.
hepsi.gelecek: In your future, some major storms, sarsıcı lies, and wrong decisions might be waiting for you in the general rhythm of life, honey. Much more honesty and painful experience than you expect will be needed for those big changes you planned to happen. If you continue to deceive yourself by saying 'everything is fine' in love and work, the chaos you will encounter in the future might completely finish you. The big lesson life will offer you will not end immediately and will make you sweat quite a bit, so you should open your eyes now. If you learn to be patient and look at events without masks now, that true big peace will be yours.

is.gecmis: Honey, in your past, you experienced such a disappointment in business life that the mountains you trusted were covered in snow and a business partnership or project remained in your heart like a wound. Perhaps you were betrayed by a friend or colleague, or you were literally destroyed when someone else stole the success you deserved. This professional 'heartache' you experienced back then completely ended your pure faith in the business world and made you much more distant. This painful experience triggers the fear of 'will I be stabbed in the back again?' even today when starting a new job. You paid the price of success with your tears in those days, darling.
is.simdi: Honey, you are currently experiencing a period of 'sadness' and 'separation' in business life; literally you feel as if your heart has been wounded from three places at once! An expected promotion news might have come back negative, or that toxic environment at work has now made you unable to breathe. This card whispers that you are mourning a finish or a loss right now, but this pain is actually preparing you for a stronger career. You might feel betrayed or left alone, but believe me, this storm is blowing so that you can realize your true talents. I know it hurts right now, but you must accept the pain first to remove those swords.
is.gelecek: In your future, a breakup that will shake you quite a bit regarding your career plans or a risk of a project resulting in failure appears, darling. The fact that the other party lets you down in an important business deal or you are treated unfairly might cool you off from the business world for a while. You might experience a 'mourning' period in this process, but this situation is not the end of your career, but the herald of a much more solid beginning. If you want to be successful in the future, you should learn from this painful experience and act with only logic, not your emotions, in your professional life. Those swords will be your biggest defense one day, believe in this.

para.gecmis: In your past, you experienced a very big loss financially or were betrayed financially, opening a deep wound in your wallet, darling. Perhaps you lent money to someone you trusted very much and that money never came back, or with an investment crashing, all your dreams fell into the water. Those days when the trust brought by money was suddenly shaken left you under a very big blow economically. This 'financial heartache' back then causes you to approach money always with the fear of 'it will never be enough' and 'will it go again?' today. You lived in those days not for your financial freedom, but to compensate for your losses, darling.
para.simdi: Honey, a complete period of 'loss' and 'lack of abundance' prevails in your wallet right now; you literally feel as if you've lost your money somewhere or it was stolen. Someone you trusted in financial matters disappointing you or an investment bringing the exact opposite of what you expected hurts your heart very much. This card says you are mourning a financial loss right now and this situation makes you very pessimistic toward life. In this painful period that stopped the flow of money, you should remove those swords in your mind one by one and rebuild your financial situation from scratch. You are literally at a wailing wall for your wallet right now, but these tears will make you smarter!
para.gelecek: In your future, a loss that will make you sweat a lot and a financial separation period await you, darling. You might stay in the middle of a property loss or a major money crisis and think 'everything is over.' Even though a legal struggle or the painful end of a partnership in this process wears you out quite a bit, eventually you will gain such a financial discipline that no one will be able to deceive you again. To reach financial independence in the future, you will need to pass through this painful test and look at money not with your emotions, but with logic as sharp as a sword. The gate of abundance is there, but you must heal that wounded wallet first.

saglik.gecmis: In your past, you experienced a very big pain or an organ loss/disease period regarding your health, literally feeling as if your body was pierced with swords, darling. Those days when you felt physically very tired but spiritually much more wounded taught you how life hangs by a cotton thread. Perhaps a heart problem or a chronic pain captivated you for a long time and you learned to live with this pain. This 'power of pain' you gained back then is the biggest reason for your resilient but equally melancholic state today. You understood in a very painful way back then that the way to take good care of your body is through removing those swords in your soul first.
saglik.simdi: Honey, you are currently in a complete 'heartache' and 'physical exhaustion' regarding your health; literally your body cannot withstand this sadness of yours. You might be experiencing a pressure in your chest, shortness of breath, or a general fatigue, and the source of this situation is entirely your spiritual wounds. This card whispers that you are experiencing an 'emotional shock' right now and this situation is hitting your heart or blood pressure. Please see an expert immediately and find a way for yourself to vent that pain within you; otherwise your body will not be able to carry this load anymore. The gate of healing is open to you, but you are currently kneeling and crying in front of that gate; now you must stand up.
saglik.gelecek: In your future, a 'moment of crisis' appears that will challenge you quite a bit regarding your health and where you will deal especially with heart/vessel or lung-sourced problems, darling. Those days when you neglected to take care of yourself and threw all the sadnesses inside will come across as a physical wound in the future and force you into a long treatment. Your pessimism in this process might leave you physically exhausted, so you should never neglect to get spiritual support. That big test you will give to protect your health in the future will teach you how valuable every moment of life actually is and that you shouldn't be so sad for anyone but yourself. When those swords come out, you will see how your body finds life again.

hepsi.gecmis: When I look at your past, I see a general energy of 'betrayal' and 'heartbreak'; life has wounded you many times in the places you trusted most. Those days spent among being cheated on in love, unfairness at work, and financial losses made you much more harsh and equally fragile today. Choosing to mourn instead of fixing things has left some 'painful memories' and 'fears' in your life. You were like a warrior who took their guard but took the swords directly to the heart in that period. You lost a lot of time in that pain and harrassed your soul quite a bit, honey.
hepsi.simdi: Darling, you are currently experiencing a 'post-storm ruin' period in your general life; literally everything has been scattered all of a sudden! Bad news comes from everywhere, the people you trust disappoint you, and you just want to cry. This card whispers that this current 'pain and mourning' state is sucking that big life energy within you. Why were you so sad and why did you let those swords wound you so deeply? You must wipe those tears immediately, accept your pain, and take the ropes of your life back in your hands. You are not a victim, just a hero whose heart has been very deeply wounded.
hepsi.gelecek: In your future, you will experience that familiar 'heartbreak' and 'separation' situation again in the face of the tests that await you in your general life, honey. In your career, love, and financial situation, your soul will be so constricted in the face of simultaneous losses that you might withdraw your hands from the world for a while longer. However, this time you shouldn't let those swords kill you, but empower you; because this final pain will be your spiritual awakening. If you want to find peace in the future, you should learn to balance that unlimited trust in people and say 'no' now. Life sometimes destroys so that it can build a more solid one; don't stay under that ruin, darling.

ask.gecmis: Darling, in your past, you passed through a healing period where you started to leave behind that very deep heartbreak and betrayal in your love life. You literally removed those three swords from your heart one by one, wrapped your wounds with your own love, and said 'hello' to life again. This 'healing' and 'forgiveness' state back then allowed you to refresh your pure faith in love and become a much stronger woman. Those days when you were the master of your own pain allow you to be much more wise and peaceful today when opening your heart to someone new. You came out of that big wreckage within love, literally reborn from your ashes like a phoenix, darling.
ask.simdi: Honey, you are currently in a complete 'healing' and 'forgetting the old' period in your love life; literally that heavy burden on your heart is lifting! You are now completely removing those bad memories, betrayals, and disappointments from your ex from your life and liberating your soul. This card says you've stopped crying now and are looking at the future with hope, preparing to open the doors of your heart again. If you've had problems with your partner, now is the time to make peace and wrap the wounds with mutual understanding. You are on the verge of an emotional spring right now, just sweep away those last fragments of grief, darling.
ask.gelecek: The magnificent peace waiting for you in your future in the name of love appears as a reward for all those past heartbreaks. That person will enter your life not to pick at your wounds, but to kiss and heal them. Perhaps that magnificent 'reunion' or a much healthier beginning coming after a very painful separation will carry you above the clouds. In the future, while living the most healing and peaceful state of love, you will be grateful for how all those pains you experienced prepared you for this happiness. Get ready darling, the most 'peaceful' love period of your life is starting very soon.

is.gecmis: In your past, you had already digested that big unfairness or loss you experienced in business life and lived a period where you continued your career much more ambitiously. Perhaps those who cost you your job or went behind your back fell into the pit they dug themselves, and this way you saw justice being served. This 'standing up again' and 'forgiving' stance in those days earned your professional identity immense maturity and respect. That period where you turned pain into experience still allows you to manage even the toughest crises with coolheadedness in the business world today. You paid the price of success and now it was time to reap the fruits.
is.simdi: Honey, you are currently under a complete 'recovery' and 'compensation' energy in business life; literally you are erasing the traces of those old failures or disappointments! You are in a magnificent period where resentments at work end, a lost reputation is regained, or a half-finished project is successfully completed. Everyone admires how resilient and professional you are; you are literally being reborn from your ashes like a phoenix. This card says to put those business pains from the past aside right now and focus on the fresh opportunities before you with all your strength. Success is waiting at the door, just put that wounded wand aside and declare your victory, darling.
is.gelecek: In your future, there is news of a magnificent improvement regarding your career plans, the rectification of unfairness, and a much more peaceful working environment. You will reach such a level that you will see the regret of everyone who saddened you in the past, and you will only be talked about with your successes. Perhaps that miraculous door will open where you will leave a very painful job and gain that peaceful and fruitful job of your dreams. In the future, you will fix everything called 'irreparable' in business life and enjoy working with peace. Success will be the brightest fruit of your patient and forgiving stance, believe in this.

para.gecmis: In your past, you left behind that big financial ruin or scam story you experienced and passed through a period where you started to fill your wallet again. Those days when you acted much more carefully, cautiously, and wisely while managing money were your economic awakening. Those days when you put that painful experience brought by money into your pocket as a lesson allow you to take much firmer steps financially today. This 'healing wounds' and 'clearing debts' state back then allows you to look at money more hopefully but equally strategically today. You discovered back then that abundance is not just earning, but also repairing losses.
para.simdi: Honey, a complete period of 'healing' and 'the end of debts' prevails in your wallet right now; your face is finally starting to smile in financial matters! Those old lack of abundance fears or payment pains from the past are now ending and being replaced by a fresh, peaceful income flow. This period is a magnificent time frame where a financial injustice is compensated or you are relieved by support from an unexpected place. Because you know money is not just a paper but a healing tool, you now fill your wallet more consciously. You currently feel like a complete 'wound healing' master financially and look at your future with confidence.
para.gelecek: In your future, a very big abundance and compensation process appears that will relieve you financially and make you forget all those financial losses from the past. Perhaps a court compensation, or a debt you couldn't collect for years returning with its interest, will take your life to the peak financially. Days are very near when you will win a victory financially and use your money only for peace and security. In the future, while gaining your financial independence, you will achieve this with much firmer foundations as a wise person who learned from past mistakes. A very bright, abundant, and 'compensation for the past' future awaits you for your wallet, darling.

saglik.gecmis: In your past, you left behind that very difficult process, an accident, or a disease period where you said 'it's over' with a big miracle, and you lived that magnificent healing period where your body was revitalized, darling. You understood in the healing process of those days that those unending pains and helplessness of your body were actually for your spiritual awakening. By believing in your own inner healing power, you personally experienced how to get rid of those chronic problems or physical restrictions. This 'rebirth' energy you gained back then has been the greatest architect of your solid and glowing state today. You understood back then that the way to take good care of your body is through first forgiving those pains in your soul, darling.
saglik.simdi: Honey, your health energy is currently witnessing a miracle; you feel lighter, more energetic, and as if you've been reborn every passing day! You are in a magnificent period where those old heavy damages or chronic fatigues in your body are being repaired one by one and every cell is filled with the joy of life. Because you've thrown those heavy loads off your back, even breathing has become much more pleasant and easy for you. This card whispers that you are at a 'healing peak' right now and that the fire of life within you is burning stronger than ever. It's a time for complete compensation, help, and strengthening for your health, darling.
saglik.gelecek: The health picture waiting for you in the future promises perfect physical resistance and a long life full of healing. You are entering a very powerful period where you achieve complete peace with your body and all the traces of those past diseases are erased. Perhaps you will experience a health miracle or completely establish that peaceful lifestyle that will take your body to the highest level. The conscious and loving steps you will take to protect your health in the future will give you an energy everyone will envy even in your old age. Days when every kind of physical pain is replaced by an unquenchable fire of peace will be with you very soon, believe in this.

hepsi.gecmis: When I look at your past, I see a general energy of 'returning from death' and 'rebirth'; life has pulled you to the bottom many times but you've managed to come to the surface every time. You used that magnificent resistance power and built a new life when you were about to experience a disaster in love, work, and financial matters. Those difficult experiences were the greatest lessons that built your unshakable and wise character today that fears no ruin. You proved to the entire universe back then that success is possible not just from zero, but even from negative levels, darling. This miraculous escape back then is your greatest treasure today, never forget.
hepsi.simdi: Honey, you are currently experiencing a period of 'healing' and 'compensation' in every area of your life; as if those dark clouds have scattered and the sun has been reborn! Recovery in career, healing in relationships, and vitality in health are filling your life at the same time and revitalizing you. Now you know that no end is a finish, but on the contrary, a new beginning, and you take steps with confidence accordingly. This card whispers that it is a 'celebration of being reborn from the ashes' time for you and you are erasing all those heavy traces of the past one by one. Life embraces you honey, you are a wise hero who has survived every kind of storm right now, enjoy it.
hepsi.gelecek: Your future promises a complete rise and magnificent successes in every area of life, honey. In the future, you will notice all the difficulties you encounter before they even occur and neutralize them with your past experiences. Peace in love, unshakable success in work, and abundance in financial matters will flow into your life like a waterfall with your resilient soul. That moment when all your dreams come true will be the greatest 'comeback victory' of your life for you, darling. The universe was waiting for you to come out from that very bottom to reward you; now that magnificent peak and period of prosperity is starting for you, get ready!

ask.gecmis: My dear, you have experienced a period in your past when you escaped from the tiring chaos of love and took shelter in your inner world, leaving your heart fallow. Maybe you came out of a big storm and just needed silence; Those days when you didn't see anyone and just rested your soul were very good for you. This 'emotional break' during that period allows you to make calmer and more prudent decisions in love today. You learned in those days when your heart should be silent.
ask.simdi: You are currently in a complete 'retreat' and meditation period in your love life, honey; Doing nothing is your biggest action right now! If there is tension between you and your partner, keeping some distance and thinking objectively instead of pushing on it will be healing for both of you. If you are alone, your soul is not yet ready to open the door to someone new; First you need to silence those old voices inside you. Rest your heart today, the answers will appear automatically when you remain silent.
ask.gelecek: Most beautiful, in your future, love will greet you with a 'healing' process; You are entering a period where all those old pains subside and peace takes center stage. The bond you will encounter will not be built on loud passion, but on a quiet and deep, unshakable trust. Maybe you will prefer to be alone for a while, but you will come out of this loneliness with tremendous strength. The future promises you that serene togetherness that will make you say 'peace is the greatest luxury' in love.

is.gecmis: In the past, you have been at such an intense pace in your career that you had to take a forced break when your body and mind said 'enough is enough'. Maybe it was a leave period, maybe those quiet months when you were unemployed, but in fact you were strategizing, have become the wisest part of your professionalism today. This ability to 'stop and watch' that you gained during that period enables you to manage crises without panic today. You understood in those days that success comes not only by running but also by resting at the right time.
is.simdi: You are currently in a 'planning and retreat' phase in your business life, my dear; This is not a good time to make big moves. You need to put aside the work on your desk and just clear your mind and honestly weigh which project truly serves you. Staying away from gossip and competition at work will be your biggest professional shield right now. Today is 'fallow' time for you; Gather your energy so that your next attack will be much sharper and more effective.
is.gelecek: A quiet but profound success awaits you, in which your name will be known as a 'master of strategy' in business life in the future. You will come to a point where people will knock on your door, admiring your calm and controlled stance. Your career will offer you not only money but also a peaceful working environment without stress. The future promises you great wisdom in business life that will make you say 'the real power is not in rushing into everything, but in knowing what not to do'.

para.gecmis: In financial matters, you have experienced a 'winter' period in the past where you applied very strict discipline and completely froze your expenses in order to protect your budget. In those days, your only priority was to protect what you had and avoid risk, rather than saving money. This 'cautious' attitude of those days provides a more financially sound and 'surprise-proof' budget management today. You registered in those quiet days that money was a 'fund of peace' for you.
para.simdi: You're currently in a 'pause' period regarding your financial situation, honey; There is no gain or loss, you are in complete stability. It's not a good time to make a new investment or make a big expense, because right now your mind is just saying 'protect what you have'. The universe is sending you a message to 'stay still and wait'; Keeping your wallet closed will be the most profitable move for you these days. This material silence is actually the last preparation before a great abundance.
para.gelecek: Your financial future looks very safe and peaceful thanks to your patient and cautious attitude. In the future, you will experience a financial 'sleep of prosperity' and reach that stable income that will allow you to enjoy life without any worries. Money will no longer be a problem for you, it will just be a silent assistant that ensures your comfort. The future heralds you that magnificent period when money will flow to you, admiring your discipline, and you will find great peace with very little effort.

saglik.gecmis: Do you remember that forced break that came with a physical 'rest' or hospital/treatment period regarding your health in the past? When your body told you 'enough is enough', you had no choice but to listen to it, and this process actually became a spiritual awakening for you. This physical 'awareness' you gained at that time has become your strongest shield that protects your body even today. You discovered in those healing days that health actually begins with 'sleep and silence'.
saglik.simdi: My dear, right now your body is whispering to you 'please sleep and rest'; Your energy is at the point of exhaustion! If you have a health problem, your best medicine right now is not drugs, but that deep silence therapy in a completely dark room. Your body wants to lie fallow to renew itself, don't resist it. Meditating these days, staying away from the phone and focusing only on your breathing will instantly brighten all your cells; The healing is hidden in your inactivity.
saglik.gelecek: Unshakable strength in your health and complete mental well-being awaits you in the future. No matter your age, you will always remain vigorous thanks to that silent agreement between your body and soul. Diseases will stay far away from you because you will learn to understand like a wise man when your body is tired and give it the break it needs. The future promises you a healthy and clear life where you wake up in peace every morning.

hepsi.gecmis: Do you remember that tremendous period of retreat and rest in a past period of your life when you said 'I stopped the world'? That's when you escaped from all kinds of noise and retreated to that quiet room just to listen to the whispers of your own soul. This 'inner peace' you gained during that period is the strongest building block of your unshakable character in every aspect of your life today. In those days, you personally experienced that 'stopping' sometimes made you go further than 'running'.
hepsi.simdi: Honey, you are currently in one of the most 'healing' and quietest periods of your life; The universe has stopped all traffic for you! All the turmoil in your life is over, now it's time for you to just rest and make peace with yourself. Whatever you intend today, behind that intention will be the tranquility of a whole universe and the deep power within you. Just close your eyes and enjoy this tremendous silence; Because you totally deserve this break. The universe greets you in your dreams.
hepsi.gelecek: Your future looks like a very peaceful and successful path shaped by your serene and wise energy. You are entering a magnificent process in which everything in your life falls into place, one by one, and you enjoy just watching. A life awaits you where people admire your wisdom and calmness and you shine light on the world. The future will say to you 'you have rested and you are now ready to manage everything' and will greet you!

ask.gecmis: In the past, in love, you locked yourself in a room or sealed your heart for so long that you experienced a period when you missed the real life outside. Maybe after a breakup, you prolonged your grief by saying 'I'll never heal' and this has corroded your soul. This mistake of being 'inactive' at that time may prevent you from experiencing full excitement in your relationships even today. Those days when you imprisoned your own heart in a hospital still seem like a weight on your soul.
ask.simdi: My dear, there is a period of 'restlessness' and insomnia in your love life right now; You're still fighting old battles in your mind when you should be resting! You can't stop thinking about your problems with your partner even in bed, and you can't leave your soul fallow. This exhaustion inside you makes you aggressive. Today you must close those eyes and learn to surrender by saying 'I can't solve anything right now'; Love won't find you until you get better, wake up!
ask.gelecek: The risk that awaits you in love in the future may be losing your true soul mate due to burnout syndrome or acting 'dead' in a relationship and pushing the other party away from you. If you don't change this 'I don't have any energy' attitude, you may be doomed to a love that only remains in your dreams but never comes true in the future. If you want true happiness in the future, you must first learn to recharge your own batteries and get involved in life. Otherwise, your love life may always feel like a 'recovery room'.

is.gecmis: You may have been in such a state of 'inertia' or avoided taking responsibility in your career that you eventually experienced a period in your professional life where you missed the train. Maybe you missed an opportunity by saying 'I'm not ready', maybe that stagnation at work dulled all your talents. This 'excessive rest' mistake at that time leaves you with the fear of 'not being able to keep up' with every new project in your professional life today. Those days when you thought success would come not by working but just waiting are a little behind you.
is.simdi: You are currently suffering from 'burnout' and loss of motivation in your business life, honey; It's like you're falling asleep at your desk! Thousands of thoughts are going on in your mind, but you are in no mood to raise your hand, and this makes you look 'inefficient' and 'unwilling' at work. Instead of working hard these days, you should question why you're so 'bored' and maybe take a vacation; Otherwise, this lethargy may end your entire career, shake it off!
is.gelecek: The danger that awaits you in your future business life is that you may be paralyzed in a crisis and not be able to do anything, or you may be completely forgotten because you refuse change. If you don't learn how to mentally detox and regain your energy today, you may be left alone and far behind your competitors in the future. You should also consider 'resting' as a strategy to protect your future success, but you shouldn't get stuck there. Otherwise, your career path may always remain at that 'unfinished dream' stop.

para.gecmis: That 'inaction' mistake you made in the past in financial matters or that period where you forgot your money under your pillow instead of managing it may have missed your blessing today. Instead of thinking of money as energy, it seems like you chose to freeze it and just follow investment opportunities. This 'financial fear' at that time has made you feel much more anxious about money today and as if 'everything will stop again'. At that time, you limited your own abundance only because of your ambition to 'live risk-free'.
para.simdi: You are currently in a serious 'stress' and congestion phase regarding your money situation, dear; It's like your wallet is in a deep sleep! Your income is not increasing, the payments you expect are not coming, and you are very angry about this situation. This state of 'unrest' within you causes you to close the doors of abundance yourself. When making financial decisions these days, instead of saying 'whatever happens', you should quietly examine your accounts; Otherwise, you may waste your last savings in unnecessary panic in this chaos.
para.gelecek: The biggest risk that awaits you in your financial future may be not seeing the huge opportunities that come your way due to excessive frugality, or missing out on the abundance of your wealth because you only save money and never use it. If you don't fix your 'cold' relationship with money today, you may always live with a feeling of 'inadequacy' financially in the future. If you want prosperity in the future, you must understand that money is a flow and you must join this flow. Otherwise, you may always live in fear of going bankrupt financially.

saglik.gecmis: In the past, you have neglected a situation related to your health by saying 'it will go away anyway' and tried to ignore those warning signals of your body by just sleeping. Maybe you came back to life without fully healing an illness, and that's why your body has always had a feeling of 'incompleteness'. This state of 'procrastination' you experienced at that time may have left you with a sensitivity and a fragility as if you would get tired at any moment, even today. It seems like you've made your own healing a burden simply because of your impatience.
saglik.simdi: You are currently in a state of 'burnout' and energy blockage regarding your health, honey; Your body can't handle this 'sleepless night' mode anymore! You feel physically very heavy, sleepless and drained of energy because your mind won't stop. These symptoms actually carry the message of 'really rest, don't just lie down'. These days you should visit a doctor or at least try natural methods to calm your nervous system; If you don't shine from within, there will be no healing, wake up!
saglik.gelecek: The problems you may experience with your health in the future may be neurological disorders caused by insomnia, migraines, or the collapse of the immune system due to excessive fatigue. If you don't regulate your lifestyle today and learn to 'quiet your mind', your body may give you a much harsher 'I'm done' warning in the future. In order to be fitter in the future, you must calm your soul and make peace with your body now. Health will only last when you are in balance.

hepsi.gecmis: You have stopped that great awakening and vision that you should have experienced in a past period of your life because of your own fears or your stubbornness of 'I'm not ready'. It's like fate opened a door for you, but you fell asleep in front of that door. This feeling of 'stuckness' you experienced at that time creates a feeling of 'incompleteness' in your entire life today. You feel like time is wasted and you're still sitting in that old waiting room; Shake yourself up!
hepsi.simdi: There is chaos in your life right now because you are running around where you should be resting, and you are sleeping where you should be running, my dear; This is your biggest mistake. There are opportunities, but you cannot see them or do not take them seriously because of your 'burnout' stubbornness. He should shake himself up as soon as possible, put down those swords in his hands honestly and say 'when did I stay with myself?' you should ask. If your perspective does not change, your life will not open a new door for you; You need to take that healing step.
hepsi.gelecek: What awaits you in the future may be a recurring regret of 'wasted years' if you don't change your resigned and tired attitude. You can miss the great beginnings that life offers you just because you cannot make that last move. To save your future, you must put 'renewal' and discipline back at the center of your life today. Otherwise, life may leave you in even greater despair at a point you never wanted; be alert!

is.gecmis: Darling, in your past, you went through a period where those tiring ego wars and meaningless clashes in your business life finally ended, and you chose 'to be peaceful rather than right.' Even if you had your heart broken or faced injustice, leaving that chaos behind gave you a professional maturity. This withdrawal was actually the greatest step taken for you to follow a more strategic and peaceful path in your career. You understood back then that success is not just about winning, but sometimes giving up the fight. All those tensions have enabled you to be a much more sensible and conciliatory leader today.
is.simdi: Honey, you are in a much calmer period where the waters have settled in your work life and that unnecessary competition has given way to reconciliation. You are no longer interested in who won; you are just focusing on your own projects and peace, channeling your energy correctly. These moments when resentments at work end or a middle ground is found for a project allow you to rebuild your professional reputation. This card whispers that by withdrawing from ego wars, you have opened the door to real success. You are currently a sage who has put their sword in its scabbard and uses their intelligence only to produce.

You are currently in a much more peaceful phase and open to the right investments.
