If you have a health problem, today you are in a magnificent moment where that problem is solved radically and your body repairs itself like a queen. Mental detoxification these days and staying away from pollution such as smoking/alcohol will take your healing power to the top; you shine!
saglik.gelecek: Unshakable strength in your health and lifelong well-being awaits you in the future. No matter your age, you will always remain vigorous and young thanks to the tremendous cooperation between your body and mind. Diseases will stay far away from you because you will have made consciously nourishing and protecting your body a way of life. The future promises you a healthy life where you wake up with great clarity every morning; You are the queen of healing.

hepsi.gecmis: Do you remember that moment of tremendous independence and success in a past period of your life when you said, 'I can bring the world to its knees by myself'? That's when you ended all kinds of emotional exploitation and declared the peace of great honesty with your loved ones and yourself. This 'dignified' identity you gained during that period is the strongest building block of success in every aspect of your life today. In those days, you personally experienced that justice was a magic key that opened every door.
hepsi.simdi: Honey, you are currently in one of the wisest, most honest and most 'independent' periods of your life; The universe salutes your nobility! All the secrets in your life come to light, the uncertainties result in merging with your vision, and you now feel complete. Whatever you intend today, there will be the justice and support of a whole universe behind that intention. Just listen to your mind and enjoy this magnificent unity; Because you deserve this respect to the fullest.
hepsi.gelecek: Your future looks like a bright and victorious path shaped by your honest and wise energy. You are entering a process in which everything in your life falls into place, one by one, and every intention of yours is realized with great success. A life awaits you where people admire your wisdom and honesty and you improve the world with your intelligence. The future will say to you, 'truth will be your greatest treasure' and will greet you!

ask.gecmis: In the past, you have been so rigid and 'emotionless' in love that you eventually condemned your own heart to a prison of ice. Maybe you criticized your partner very harshly, or maybe you chose to live by holding on to hatred after a breakup. This 'vengeful' or cold mistake at that time may still be preventing you from establishing complete intimacy in your relationships today. Those days when you wounded your own heart with a sword still feel like an ache in your soul.
ask.simdi: My dear, there is a period of 'destructive language' and anger in your love life right now; You may be being sarcastic and rude towards your partner! You are trying to make someone else pay for your pain, and you are breaking hearts in the name of honesty. This unrest inside you makes you lonely or makes your partner run away from you. Today, he puts the sword in his hand aside and asks 'why am I so unhappy?' You should ask; True love will not find you until you vomit the hatred within you, wake up now!
ask.gelecek: The risk that awaits you in love in the future is that you may alienate your true soul mate because of your excessive control or lack of compassion. If you expect constant 'obedience' or 'perfection' from your partner, you may be doomed to a relationship that is only on paper but dead in spirit. If you want true happiness in the future, you must learn to see love as a surrender, not a judgment. Otherwise, your love life may always remain a 'widow' sadness.

is.gecmis: You've been so 'bully' or unfairly competitive in your career that you didn't end up gaining the respect you deserve in your professional life. Maybe you tried to rise by catching someone's vulnerability and exposing them, but that sword eventually turned on you. This 'ethical error' at that time may have caused some people to approach you with distance and distrust in your professional life today. You didn't understand in those days that success comes not only with knowledge but also with style.
is.simdi: You are currently suffering from a 'discredit' and gossip pain in your business life, my dear; It's like all the work you've done has suddenly lost its value! Your decisions are inconsistent, and your energy scares rather than motivates those around you. Your relationships with your colleagues at work are tense, and things going behind your back or jealousy are draining your energy. Instead of shouting with ambition these days, you should question why you feel so 'unsatisfied' and find that compassionate queen within yourself; Otherwise you will be pulled down from that peak.
is.gelecek: The danger that awaits you in your future business life may be sabotaging your own career due to excessive arrogance and underestimation of people. If you do not learn to cooperate but not lose your honesty today, you may be left alone and disgraced in front of your competitors in the future. To protect your future success, you must urgently give up the 'woman is a woman's wolf' mentality. Otherwise, your career path may always remain at that 'nobody loves me' stop.

para.gecmis: Those 'vengeful spending' you made in the past in financial matters or the mistake of using money as a punishment tool may have missed your blessings today. That period when you squandered money to hurt someone instead of managing it has made you more limited and anxious today. Maybe you succumbed to your ambitions in a divorce or partnership case and the money you earned did not bring you peace. This 'material illusion' of that period drives you into a state of unnecessary anger every time you look at your wallet today.
para.simdi: You are currently in serious 'dissatisfaction' and chaos regarding your financial situation, my dear; You may have money, but the way you spend it is very aggressive! Even if a financial opportunity comes, you do not compromise with anyone by saying 'I am right' and this prevents your abundance. These days, when making financial decisions, you should act only with your logic, not your emotions or ambitions; Otherwise, in this chaos, you may spend the last of your savings for the sake of luxury and power struggle. To close that hole in your wallet, you must first end your hunger to be loved.
para.gelecek: The biggest risk that awaits you in your financial future may be experiencing a big loss in an investment you made with overconfidence or by saying 'law will solve everything'. If you do not learn financial discipline today and stop using money as a tool of pressure, you may always live with a feeling of 'loneliness' and 'inadequacy' financially in the future. If you want prosperity in the future, you should use your financial power as a tool of balance, not as a victim mentality. Otherwise, you may always live in fear of going bankrupt financially.

saglik.gecmis: You have neglected a situation related to your health in the past, saying 'nothing will happen to me' or being angry with your body. Maybe you focused only on your mental pain and ignored the physical symptoms, and that's why your body became weak. This state of 'neglect' you experienced at that time may have left you feeling sensitive even today and panicking at the slightest pain, saying 'Am I under attack again?' At that time, it seemed like you ignored your own body's needs simply out of arrogance and anger.
saglik.simdi: You're in the throes of 'burnout' and nervous tension regarding your health right now, honey; Your body can't handle this 'I control everything' stress anymore! Headaches, insomnia or nervous itching may be an expression of your current state of stress. You should take time for yourself these days, quiet your ego a little and let your body repair itself; Healing will only come back when you truly decide to 'stop', wake up!
saglik.gelecek: The problems you may experience with your health in the future may be neurological disorders caused by excessive mental fatigue, migraines, or collapse of the immune system due to excessive stress. If you do not regulate your lifestyle today and do not consider 'quieting your mind' as a success, your body may give you a much harsher 'stop' warning in the future. To be fitter in the future, you need to create a healthy routine now and honestly heal your soul. Health stays with you only when you honestly say 'I want to get better'.

hepsi.gecmis: You ruined that great success that you should have experienced in a past period of your life because of your own arrogance or lack of compassion. Just when fate had opened a door for you, you made a mistake or used that power on the wrong people. This feeling of 'unfinishedness' that you experienced at that time creates a feeling of 'incompleteness' in your entire life today. It's like you feel like your time is wasted and you're still waiting in the shadow of that old failure.
hepsi.simdi: There is chaos in your life right now because you are trying to control everything, but the real issue is the lack of self-confidence within you, dear; This is your biggest mistake. You want everything to look perfect, but you can't even see the beauty in your hands because of that 'empty' feeling inside. He should shake himself up as soon as possible, sheath the sword in his hand honestly and ask 'why am I so aggressive?' you should ask. If your perspective does not change, your life will not open a new door for you; You need to take that step of peace.
hepsi.gelecek: The process that awaits you in the future may be a recurring fate of 'lonely summit' if you do not change this dissatisfied and oppressive attitude. You can miss the tremendous opportunities that life offers you simply because you cannot find that inner compassion. To save your future, you must put 'gratitude' and honesty back at the center of your life today. Otherwise, life may leave you in even greater loneliness at a point you never wanted; be alert!

ask.gecmis: Darling, in your past, you were under the influence of an authoritative and intellectual energy that literally fascinated you with their intelligence and honesty in your love life. You experienced such a love that the period where mental harmony and honesty were at the forefront and everything was spoken openly added a lot to you. Perhaps you represented the logical side of love in your own life and you drew your boundaries in the clearest way without being beholden to anyone. This 'objective' atmosphere back then causes you to base your expectations from love on honesty and intelligence even today. You felt to your deepest core how honest and respected a kingdom love could be in those days.
ask.simdi: Honey, you are currently in a complete 'decision-maker' and 'strategist' position in your love life; literally the ropes of love are in the hands of your intelligence! While everyone around you admires that noble and clear energy of yours in this period when you have irresistible logic and honesty, they are also a bit afraid. If you have a relationship, you put everything on a transparent ground by exhibiting both a guiding and boundary-protecting attitude toward your partner. This card says that you are a soul who knows what you want in love right now and uses your intelligence to get it, never allowing manipulation. You are the most honest and intelligent queen of love right now, just maintain that clear stance!
ask.gelecek: In your future, a very knowledgeable, honest king, perhaps a powerful one from the world of law or academia, awaits you to radically change your life in the name of love! You will meet someone such that you will feel powerful and intellectual enough to establish not just a home but literally an empire of ideas with them. This relationship will be not only an emotional bond, but also a victory path where you respect each other and every decision is taken with common logic. In the future, you will live the most mature, most transparent, and most respected state of love and say 'here is that honest soul I seek.' Get ready honey, a real legend of intelligence and honesty is about to be written for you.

is.gecmis: In your past, you acted literally like a 'strategy genius' in your career, giving direction to big projects with your sharp intelligence and authority, darling. You had such logic and analysis ability that everyone looked to your word and followed those honest, unshakable decisions of yours. That period when you established a job systematically or swung your sword with logic in a moment of crisis and showed the most correct way was the golden age of your professional identity. This rational and honest soul of yours from those days is the greatest legacy that enables you to see an unshakable reputation even today in the business world. You showed everyone back then that success is not just working hard, but giving the right decisions honestly.
is.simdi: Honey, you are currently acting with a complete 'authority' energy in business life; literally everything is being shaped according to your vision and honesty! Your intelligence and persuasion ability are so high that you solve every complex obstacle that comes your way one by one with logic and run toward your goals with determination. This period is a time frame when the universe supports you to the fullest to handle legal issues, sign important signatures, or play for the top level in your career. Never hesitate to use your leadership qualities because your honest and sharp word opens every door right now. You are the king of your career, continue to use that mental sword in the most correct place, honey.
is.gelecek: In your future, there is the news of a magnificent rise in your business life, perhaps a peak of consultancy or being the strategy leader of a giant institution. You will reach such a point on the career path that you will now act with a global vision and as a monument of honesty. All your efforts will bear fruit in the most magnificent way and you will sit in that respected victory seat with everyone's appreciation. A responsibility you will soon take will turn you into a monument of 'wisdom' both financially and spiritually. Get ready honey, it's very close for you to be a complete 'opinion leader' in the business world.

para.gecmis: In your past, you acted literally like a 'financial strategist' in a financial sense and laid the foundations of a large accumulation with logical decisions, honey. You knew how to manage money, where to invest so honestly and systematically that you passed through a period when your abundance never encountered any legal glitch. Those days when you built your financial freedom with your own intelligence and became a financial authority are the sole source of that trust in your wallet even today. You proved in the past in the most noble form that money is not just luck, but a correct analysis tool. This honest gain consciousness back then has ingrained into your professional soul, darling.
para.simdi: Honey, you are currently in complete mastery and clarity regarding your financial resources; you have literally become the master of money! You have magnificent strategic ideas to increase your income and you have that great intelligence to realize all of them in legal grounds. The abundance of your wallet increases along with that honest stance of yours and you use your financial power not just for yourself, but also to provide justice. This period is the time to collect the reward of your smart and honest moves and enjoy your financial independence in its most peaceful form. The energy of abundance is revolving around your logical decisions, just enjoy this financial kingdom.
para.gelecek: In your future, a complete 'wealth authority' and an unshakable economic power card is opening for you in financial terms. A legal gain larger than you ever expected might come into your hands or a business partnership/signature gate that will keep you like a king for a lifetime might open. Glorious days are at the door when financial worries will completely end and you will only focus on big and honest investments. The universe has made all its preparations and is waiting to reward you with abundance because of this honest and visionary stance of yours. Your future is full of bright gold and legal victories, you will live at the highest level of prosperity, darling.

saglik.gecmis: In your past, you displayed such a great discipline and rational attitude regarding your health that everyone admired your body's healing process. Those days when you felt very fit, energetic, and adeta like someone ruling their body with their mind taught you what a magnificent system your body is. Perhaps you defeated a disease only with the correct diagnoses and a disciplined treatment, or you successfully completed a tough regime that would take your body to the highest level. This 'rational healing' power you gained in that period was the biggest architect of your solid and authoritative stance today. You understood back then more than enough that the way to take good care of your body is through clearing your mind first, honey.
saglik.simdi: Honey, right now your health energy is working at full capacity and discipline; you feel literally as fit and clear as a sage! That magnificent harmony between your body and your mind gives you a magnificent charisma and physical resilience. You feel more balanced than ever and you only make logical and healthy choices while keeping up with the rhythm of life. This card heralds that you have completely defeated a health glitch if you had one through an honest treatment or your general well-being has peaked. Your light and life energy are noticed even from the outside, you are literally shining with health and that asalet worthy of queens, darling.
saglik.gelecek: In your future, the health picture waiting for you promises a perfect vitality and a long, honest life, honey. You are entering a very peaceful period where you provide complete mastery over your body and every cell is renewed with honesty and health. Even in old age, you will have an intelligence and vitality that will stone those around you and you will be an example to everyone with your health. A taptaze and powerful you is being born in the future where every kind of physical and spiritual disorder will end. The years ahead will pass with health, peace, and that noble, rational energy, believe in this.

hepsi.gecmis: When I look at your past, I see a general 'strategist' and 'honest leader' energy; in a period of your life, you literally brought the whole world to its knees with your intelligence. You lived that honest bond in love, that magnificent success in work, and that unshakable discipline in health at the same time, literally being one with the universe. Those days when everyone respected you and benefited from those honest decisions of yours are the strongest part of your character even today. You proved to the whole world back then how to stand honest and wise in every area of life, honey. Success was engraved in your soul back then like a royal seal.
hepsi.simdi: Honey, right now you are experiencing a period of 'authority' and 'transparency' in every area of your life; everything is progressing exactly as you want and manage! You are in a magnificent balance where you enjoy honesty in love, establishing authority in work, and financial prosperity at the same time. Your self-confidence is so high that every step you take arouses admiration and a bit of respectful hesitation around you. This card says that it is a 'strategy victory' time for you and you should maintain all the victories you have won with honesty. Life greets you honey, you are a wise leader who manages the world with his intelligence right now.
hepsi.gelecek: Your future promises a magnificent empire where you will reach the very top in every area of life and say 'I won with my intelligence.' While you rise to the highest office you can reach in your career, you will also live that great happiness honestly with your soulmate like a king and queen. A period when no financial deficiency remains and your health shines brightly will rule your life very soon. That moment when all your dreams merge and turn into a single big honesty will be the biggest victory of your life. The universe has made all its preparations and is waiting to reward you, be ready for this magnificent future!

ask.gecmis: Honey, in your past, you completely suppressed your emotions while trying to be too logical in your love life and therefore you lived a very cold, distant relationship and were eventually disappointed. Perhaps your partner was very manipulative and someone who beat you with his words or you defended your own truths so harshly that you broke the heart of the person across from you. This 'emotional drought' and 'destructive honesty' state back then causes you to exhibit a more prejudiced and harsh stance toward love even today. While you were trying to protect your own mind in love, you lost love for a period, darling.
ask.simdi: Honey, right now you might be experiencing a 'communication accident' and 'manipulation' period in your love life; it's as if you want everything to be your way. You might be acting very harsh, critical, and even sarcastic toward your partner, which breaks that beautiful bond between you more and more every day. If you are single, you exhibit such an unapproachable and arrogant attitude that the hearts of those who want to approach you turn back from the door. This card whispers that you are using your intelligence right now not to love, but to come out right. You should soften up a bit and see love not as a logic test, but as a heart sharing, honey.
ask.gelecek: In your future, in some situations you will experience in the name of love, you have the risk of experiencing big breakups because of your extreme harshness or resorting to lies. That 'intelligent' looking person you will encounter might be a tiran who sours you mentally and turns everything to his own advantage. Your moving away completely from empathy by saying 'I know the best' in your relationships might drag you again into the same ice-cold loneliness in the future. However, this process will be a lesson given for you to learn to see not only with your mind but also with your soul in love. If you want to find peace in the future, you will need to learn to use that sword not as a weapon, but as a torch.

is.gecmis: In your past, you entered such an authority fight in business life that because of your ambition and arrogance you missed a big opportunity or encountered a legal obstacle, darling. Perhaps you were very talented but your reputation was shaken a bit because you looked down on people or resorted to unfair ways. Those steps you took with the ambition of 'I am the only one who knows' in your career must have pushed you into a big deadlock professionally for a period. Those 'despotic' and 'unjust' attitudes in those days cause you to act always with a fear of 'being caught' or 'making a mistake' in business life today. You used your intelligence in the wrong place and at the wrong time to crush people in the business world, darling.
is.simdi: Honey, right now you are experiencing a complete 'power poisoning' or on the contrary, a magnificent anger because you were treated unfairly; you are in constant conflict with those around you. Trying to control everything at work but breaking people makes you a very tense and unbearable state. This card says that this current 'harsh and manipulative' attitude of yours could cause serious damage to your career and open big legal problems. Please step back a bit, respect the ideas of others and don't turn into a dictator while trying to lead. Where you should stop right now is to put that sword in its scabbard and try to be a bit tolerant.
is.gelecek: In your future, some harsh obstacles regarding your career plans, legal cases, and big conflicts you will experience with authority figures appear. Because of your ambition for an important project or position, you might compromise on honesty and level everything to the ground at once. You have a risk of winning the hatred of those around you by using your charisma and intelligence wrongly in business life, and this might leave you very alone in the future. If you want to reach success, you will need to learn not to beat people with your intelligence, but to guide them. Otherwise, that career kingdom you dream of will never be yours, be aware.

para.gecmis: In your past, you might have taken a very risky and legal-limit-pushing decision in financial sense and taken a big financial blow by succumbing to your arrogance, darling. Those uncalculated spendings or wrong investments you made saying 'I know every law, every way' brought you to the brink of legal crises for a period. Those days when you used money as a show of power and crushed people financially might be following you today. This 'financial show-off' curiosity in that period causes you to approach money always with a fear of 'it will never be enough' and 'will I lose again?' today. You spent money for your ego, not for your financial freedom, in those days, honey.
para.simdi: Honey, right now a 'disorder' and 'excessive control' obsession prevails in your wallet; you act as if money is a tool that exists to satisfy your ego. Trying to show your financial situation much better than it is or trying to obtain gain by using legal gaps might be dragging you into a big disaster. This card whispers that instead of protecting your financial resources, you are burning them like a fire of ambition. You should urgently make a budget plan and understand that money is a temporary power and real power is in honesty. Time has come to cut those 'manipulative' spendings in your wallet right now, otherwise everything will be consumed.
para.gelecek: In your future, some losses you will experience in financial sense might grow even more because of your arrogance, legal mistakes, and wrong investment decisions. Not listening to the honest advice of others in a financial crisis and insisting by saying 'my word is right' could lead you to a big bankruptcy. If you avoid that modest struggle you must give to protect your money, you might lose all your financial power and respect in the future. In this process, it is a must to learn to be patient and use your ethical values, not your ambition, while managing money. If you want to get rich in the future, you should get rid of those royal fantasies in your wallet now.

saglik.gecmis: In your past, you ignored a warning regarding your health by saying 'I am very smart, it will pass' or by completely ignoring your emotions and harrassed your body a lot, darling. Those heavy loads that excessive stress, mental fatigue, and not taking time for yourself brought stopped you completely at one point. Perhaps you dealt with nervous system or head pains for a period because your mind couldn't handle that high fiery tempo and arrogance. You understand better now how much you neglected your health back then and how you acted like a tiran to your body. You silenced the voice of your body in those times not like a wise person, but like a cruel person, honey.
saglik.simdi: Honey, right now your body is literally in 'mental poisoning' and 'excessive tension'; your unquenchable ambition and arrogance are burning and destroying every cell! You are forcing yourself so much under the mask of honesty that your brain has reached the point of giving an error now. This card cries out that you should urgently take a break right now, meditate, or at least shut up for a bit. You cannot manage the whole world, you should first take that sharp sword in your mind under control. Please put aside those arrogant and hurtful thoughts; otherwise you have a risk of experiencing a serious health problem very soon, darling.
saglik.gelecek: In your future, a process appears that will challenge you quite a bit regarding health and where you will deal especially with diseases caused by mental fatigue. As long as you see taking care of yourself as a 'weakness', your healing will also be that much delayed and painful. The physical fatigues you will encounter in the future and especially head/neck-related problems will be a result of your current obsession with control. In the future, you might have to enter into a very radical and perhaps painful lifestyle change program to regain your health. If you don't learn to silence that angry and arrogant king within you now, your body will stop you one day by force.

hepsi.gecmis: When I look at your past, I see a general 'ego victim' and 'wrong use of intelligence' energy; life has tested you many times with your arrogance. Acting selfishly in love, breaking people at work, and saying 'nothing happens to me' in health might have dragged you into some deep regrets today. Those days when you lost your inner peace and honesty while trying to manage the lives of others have left a deep void in your soul. You shook your wand against life not like a king, but like a despot, and this left you alone, honey. This 'wrong power' use back then still makes you restless today.
hepsi.simdi: Darling, right now you are in a phase of 'obsession with control' and 'intolerance' in your general life; you act as if everyone is your servant. But deep down you are so alone and so tense that your soul is literally melting under the burning fire of your mind. This card whispers that this current 'harsh and oppressive' state of yours drags you to the edge of the abyss. Why did you become so aggressive and why are you pushing everyone away from you? You must pull yourself together immediately, learn to be modest, and take the ropes of your life not with anger, but with love. You can be a king but remember that real kings rule with mercy, not honesty.
hepsi.gelecek: In your future, you have the risk of acting excessively stubborn and harsh in the face of the tests that await you in your general life, honey. If you don't revitalize that tolerance and compassion within you, life will crush you as it wishes and leave you alone. You might experience big losses in your career, love, and financial situation because of your ambition and you can destroy the reputation you built with your own hands again with your own hands. However, this situation is your choice; whether to use your intelligence as a light or as a sword is completely in your hands. If you want to find peace in the future, you should be cleansed of your arrogance now.
